Title: Serious Sam Classics Christmas Mappers Collective Mappack
Filename: ChristmasMappersCollectiveMappack.gro
Authors: Biohazard Dood, Maska322 and Beef
Number of Levels: 3
Date of Release: 25th December 2021

Description

The idea of this project was to make one mappack as a group like it was done by some mapping groups while Serious Sam 1 was popular in 2001-2005 era. It was also organized so we can make winter themed maps only but with custom textures, models, etc. All maps are between 15 and 40 minutes and are randomly put into order that form 1 continuity. Plot and weapons aren't carried over from one map to another and author of each map decides with what weapons you start the map. Maps being in 1 continuity means that you can play all those maps without being brought back to main menuafter each map. All maps are unlocked in level selection menu so you can choose to play any map that you want at any time. There are 3 maps in this mappack that have around 1 hour of playtime in total. Enjoy!

Note : Due to low number of maps they won't be put into 1 continuity so each time you finish a map you'll have to choose another map from main menu

List of participants (not a ranking)

1. Biohazard Dood --- ChristmasInSitten
2. Maska322 --- Secrets of Glacial Mines
3. Beef --- A Detour
